entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Periods of snow beginning this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle early this afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 12:08 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing this evening and dissipating after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 12:08 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
